radiographic_examinations.findings: air-space consolidation with a small pleural effusion on the right side
consolidation with a small right-sided pleural effusion
large, left-sided pneumothorax with a left apical cavity measuring 2.7 cm by 2.4 cm and air-space infiltrates in the lingula and right upper lobes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: decrease in the size of the pneumothorax, with nearly full expansion of the left lung

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: contrast-enhanced CT scan of the head
radiographic_examinations.findings: four well-demarcated ring-enhancing lesions in the left cerebral hemisphere with extensive surrounding vasogenic edema
